title.rendered: Johnson Consulting Group Welcomes New Director of Accounting & Financial Management

content.rendered:
Scottsdale, AZ (July, 2021) — Johnson Consulting Group is excited to welcome Nini Johnston as Director of Accounting & Financial Management. Nini is quickly making a significant, positive impact on the company culture and will continue the progression with the clients she and the Accounting & Financial Management Team serve.

 

“We continue to recruit top talent to propel us to the next level of Customer Service for both our clients and company, and Nini is the perfect fit.” says President and CEO Jake Johnson, “She brings vast experience in accounting and financial management, customer service and relationship-building. It was a natural transition to bring her onto our Leadership Team. She’s ready to impact and delight our clients, and I am very excited for her future with Johnson Consulting Group!”

 

Johnston has more than 20 years of experience in accounting, treasury, financial management and customer experience. She has earned multiple degrees including a Bachelor of Psychology from Dartmouth College, a Master of Professional Counseling and a Master of Accounting and Financial Management, which was earned with distinction. Recently she served as the Director of Treasury and Accounting for a mid-size, multinational, contract manufacturing firm.

 

Johnston states, “I am excited to serve the community within the funeral profession. They are true caregivers. I am honored to be able to work with like-minded people, who give much of their time and energy to others. I am excited to engage with and learn from them.”

 

As the Director of Accounting & Financial Management, Johnston will lead the Accounting & Financial Management team in providing clients with quality reports and financial insights to fit their business needs.

 

”Nini possesses an energy and passion that reflects and embraces the CX Culture of our Team. I cannot wait to see her connection grow with the funeral profession and the Johnson Consulting Team.” Says Chief Operations Officer Jeff Casey.

 

Interested parties can reach Nini Johnston in her new capacity as Director of Accounting & Financial Management at njohnston@johnsonconsulting.com.

 

Johnson Consulting Group is committed to providing intelligent business solutions that address operational and financial needs within funeral homes and cemeteries. By creating personalized partnerships with these professionals to streamline their systems and processes, it allows them to save time and focus on what matters. Our solutions include business brokerage & valuations, technology, employee growth & incentive programs, financial management & accounting services, loans, professional consulting and coaching, online training, and much more.

 

For more information about the Johnson Consulting Group email info@johnsonconsulting.com or visit us at www.johnsonconsulting.com.
